about_the_game: The Shadow Warrior 2: Bounty Hunt Part 2 DLC delivers thirteen thrilling new missions, two spectacular new weapons, and three powerful new perks for Lo Wang and the gang. Strap on your katana and go for one last ride alone or in co-op through missions like Lost Girls, Missing Yakuza, and Danger Zone with new weapons like the Tactical Bullet Spewing Machine (TBSM).
detailed_description: The Shadow Warrior 2: Bounty Hunt Part 2 DLC delivers thirteen thrilling new missions, two spectacular new weapons, and three powerful new perks for Lo Wang and the gang. Strap on your katana and go for one last ride alone or in co-op through missions like Lost Girls, Missing Yakuza, and Danger Zone with new weapons like the Tactical Bullet Spewing Machine (TBSM).

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS *: Windows 7/8/8.1/10 x64
  • Processor: Intel Core i3-6300 (2 * 3800) or AMD A10-5800K APU (4 * 3800) or equivalent
  • Memory: 8 MB RAM
  • Graphics: GeForce GT 560Ti (1024 MB) or Radeon HD 6850 (1024 MB) or better
  • Network: Broadband Internet connection
  • Storage: 14 MB available space
